name: Some Puzzler Solvers
description:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

WARNING !!!

THIS GAME CONTAINS BRIGHT,

FLASHING COLORS.

IF YOU HAVE A PROBLEM REGARDING BRIGTHT,

FLASHING COLORS PLEASE EXIT THIS GAME.

YOU HAVE BEEN WARNED.

------------------------------

It's like VALORANT but actually fun and not like VALORANT.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

CURRENT VERSION -> 0.1

CURRENT AMOUNT OF PUZZLES ; 1

CURRENT AMOUNT OF PRE-MADE ROOMS : 5

Please report any bugs you encounter as it will help on the overall quality of the game.
